title: (Champion suggestion) This space dude.
body:
ok, time and space, we have time. here is space.
Hp 543+87 5/5sec +0.55
Reality Merge 50max Gain 1/2sec 1/2auto attack(1 spells) 1/being attacked by champion.
Attack ranged.
AD 53.3+3.1
Atk speed 0.668+ 1.3%
Armor 26+1.25
MR 25+1
Speed 340


Passive: Closed space area of 250/350/450/550
within 2.5 sec after 50Max reality merge, he can flash to an enemy within 450 range and creates a closed space where enemies are stunned for how much missing hp they have. stun 0.5/0.65/0.8/0.95sec +0.1sec for every 5% max hp they are missing. This closed space enhances his abilities and base stats. Gaining 5/6/7/8% AD levelx3% atk speed and 10 armour/MR. Lasts 7sec. Enemies are slowed by 10%.

Q: Spacial Collapse 17/16.5/16/15.5/15sec Within attack range
Collapses space around an enemy, causing them to be sucked to that point and slowed by 15%for 3sec after. Giving the mark of Unbalanced Space.
Unbalanced space: Attacking this enemy consumes the mark. Dealing  25%AD +2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5 of their max hp as magic damage and gaining 5 reality merge stacks.
Closed space effect: Within the closed space, sucks all enemy to the middle and stuns for an additional 0.15sec to their base stun and applying 3Unbalanced space stacks.
W: Mirage portal 65sec 1000/1500/2000/2500/3000 area
Creates a portal at a certain location within the area. Portal lasts 65sec. He can go through the portal becoming invulnerable to attack anyone before being teleported back to the  original portal after up to 2sec or he can reactivate to go back immediately. After going back, the portal starts to decompose over 5sec. Healing enemies or allies for 20hp/sec as they suck in the energy. Healing is tripled for allies.
Closed space effect: Upon appearing at the other side, the closed space follows him there and he can be there for up to 7sec.
E:Space/time Rip 27.5/27/26.5/26/25.5 sec within atk range plus 250.
Creates a portal on an enemy and in front of where he is right now. Stunning them for 0.1sec and stealing 1/1.5/2/2.5% current hp per sec as PD healing him the same amount up to 3sec. Attacking the portal consumes the buff dealing 40/55/60%AD +40/70/100/130/160 Magic damage.
Closed space effect: The enemy will be stunned for twice the duration as a bonus to the closed space stun. They now take max hp/sec as TD and attacking the portal deals 40/45/50/55/60% AD +50/95/140/185/230 magic damage. Gains 4 stacks of spacial merge.
R: Parallel World.  150/130/110.
Transports an enemy and him into a parallel reality version  of the rift. Causing a duel to happen between them. Lasts 10sec
In this place, Spacial merge gain is doubled. (not on abilities) and gains him 2x the effect of Closed space. Creating another closed space can still gain bonus effects.  Attacking gains 30 movement speed stacks 5 times.
Top or adc.

replies.body:
This has wayyyy too many stuns. It's crazy cc maybe remove the stuns off the passive or make it that you can't activate it on the same target for like 10 seconds ?

The passive itself is almost an ability, remove the stun off the E and is the Ult like a taunt that makes the target only attack you?  All in all its a pretty cool idea

its more like an arena with only you and the selected enemy inside a certain part of the rift (in an alternate reality which only you and the target is there) to go full on also the passive takes a long time to activate. Reading the Spacial merge gaining point will point out what i mean. And yes i turned the e stun to a very small amount.
